document_data.name: House of Osriant
document_data.mainbody: The '''House of Osriant''' was the name given to the priesthood of [[Osriant]]â€”how the [[god]] [[Osiris]] was called in [[Thay]].
document_data.History: As with all organizations of the [[Mulhorandi pantheon]], positions of power within the priesthood were typically hereditary and most [[priest]]s were descendants of various [[incarnation]]s of their god.
